WS_SERVER_HOST.title: Default Server Host
WS_SERVER_HOST.description: Set the host name or IP address for the WS server to listen on

WS_SERVER_PORT.title: Default Server Port
WS_SERVER_PORT.description: Set the port number for the WS server to listen on

WS_ALLOW_GUEST_LOGIN.title: Allow guest connections
WS_ALLOW_GUEST_LOGIN.description: Allow guest connections for users that are not registered or logged into the site

WS_ALLOW_REMOTE_LOGIN.title: Allow Remote Login
WS_ALLOW_REMOTE_LOGIN.description: Allow user to login (using email and password) through the socket server as well as those that are logged in to the website already

WS_REQUIRED_ADMIN_LEVEL.title: Required Admin Level
WS_REQUIRED_ADMIN_LEVEL.description: User level required in order for a user to administer the socket server (Level 0 is Twist Root User)
